channel.title: How would I got about this?

item.title: How would I got about this?
item.dc:creator: @JoshB JoshB™
item.description:
@JoshB wrote:

How would I make it that if I click the rocks (mining) I continue mining for like 2 to 3 ores? (I know to use misc.random) but how would I make it that if I clicked it the person would mine and mine until he gets like 2 ores then the animation stops? This is my current code.

if (objectIDz == 450) { mine(85,451,1,1750,"Rune Rock",3); }
To explain the above code “85” is the level of mining needed for the rock. “451” is the ore “1” is the amount “1750” is the animation. So yes help

Read full topic
item.source: How would I got about this?
